description: Deed of Variation to Legal Agreement dated 19 October 2022 relating to planning permission 19/02504/FUL (APP/Z5630/W/22/3293957)(Demolition of the Regents Wing, Pain and Diabetes Building and part demolition of the command centre at Kingston Hospital and the erection of a part 4, 6 and 8 storey building comprising 128 self contained apartments with associated care and communal facilities. Together with the provision of 61 car parking spaces including 18 disabled parking bays) - Amendments to Clause 18 to secure the payment of an increased affordable housing sum with corresponding amendments to schedule 5 disapplying the early and late stage reviews.
